import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import"../styles/style.scss";import showIcon from'../assets/show.svg';import hideIcon from'../assets/hide.svg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleUsernameChange=event=>{setUsername(event.target.value);};const handlePasswordChange=event=>{setPassword(event.target.value);};const toggleShowPassword=()=>{setShowPassword(!showPassword);};const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();// 在这里处理登录逻辑，可以发送请求给服务器等等
console.log('Username:',username);console.log('Password:',password);// 清空输入框
setUsername('');setPassword('');// 判断用户输入是否为 "student"
if(username.toLowerCase()==='student'){// 导航到 '/student' 页面
navigate('/student_info');}else{// 否则，正常导航到 '/teacher' 页面
navigate('/teacher');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login_frame",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font36",children:"\u767B\u5165\u6E2C\u9A57\u7CFB\u7D71"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font16_normal",children:"\u8F38\u5165\u5E33\u865F\u5BC6\u78BC\u4F86\u9032\u884C\u767B\u5165"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"\u5E33\u865F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input_normal",type:"text",id:"username",name:"username",value:username,onChange:handleUsernameChange,placeholder:"\u8ACB\u8F38\u5165\u5E33\u865F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input_psw",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"\u5BC6\u78BC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input_style",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:showPassword?'text':'password',id:"password",name:"password",value:password,onChange:handlePasswordChange,placeholder:"\u8ACB\u8F38\u5165\u5BC6\u78BC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:toggleShowPassword,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:showPassword?hideIcon:showIcon,alt:showPassword?'Hide':'Show'})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button_fill",type:"submit",children:"\u767B\u5165"})})]})})});};export default Login;
